overview: The documentary ‘Together’ or ‘Samen’ in Dutch, tells the story of Sam. Sam was the best friend of Tyson who is also the director. Two years ago Sam passed away at the age of twenty. This moving film portrays the grieving processes of five young adults after they abruptly lost one of their best friends. With story directors Rosanne Gjaltema and Tyson Malaihollo want to break taboos surrounding suicide and emphasize the importance of mental health.
title: Together
